name: Grim Fandango
description:
An epic tale of crime and corruption in the land of the dead.

Something's rotten in the Land of the Dead and you're being played for a sucker. Meet Manny Calavera, travel agent at the Department of Death. He sells luxury packages to souls on their four-year journey to eternal rest. But there's trouble in paradise. Help Manny untangle himself from a conspiracy that threatens his very salvation.

* Take a shadowy voyage into Mexico's fantasmagorical Land of the Dead.
* Experience beautiful 3D Art Deco and Aztec-inspired environments.
* Encounter 55 fascinating characters in a film noir epic spanning four years of challenging twists and turns.
* Travel through 90 exotic locations, from the busting metropolis of El Marrow to the mountaintop portal to the Ninth Underworld.
* Solve hundreds of hair-tugging puzzles from simple to tricky to hillarious.
